message: Supreme Court sides w/Trump admin on nationwide injunctions in birthright citizenship case

My exp. w/jury duty was intense—especially during the jury selection process. I was disappointed by the quality of the evidence presented. It was clear that much more could have been done to build a stronger case. The investigative work felt rushed and incomplete, reflecting a lack of effort by both the police and the state. Unfortunately, I don’t believe the individuals involved will receive any meaningful support after this. To the state, it seemed like just another case to move through the system.
Picked-Up @theMuska newly released classic board with red griptape! #nostalgia
